content: free family hat by lavanya patricella this hat is knit in super bulky yarn for a fast and beginner friendly project with sizes for the whole family measurements 15 x6 5 17x7 5 19 x8 5 21 x9 materials 45 57 69 81 yards super bulky yarn us 11 16 circular needles us 11 dpns 1 stitch marker gauge 11 stitches and 16 row = 4 in 1x1 rib stitch on us 11 or size needed to obtain gauge abbreviations co = cast on k = knit stitch k2tog = knit two stitches together p = purl stitch instructions with us 11 or size needed to obtain gauge and color a co 40 48 56 64 sts being careful not to twist pm and join in the round round 1 *p1 k1 repeat from * to end of round repeat round 1 until work measures 6 7 8 8 5 from cast on edge begin decrease shaping switching to dpns when necessary round 2 *k2tog repeat from * to end of round 20 24 28 32 sts round 3 knit to end of round round 4 *k2tog repeat from * to end of round 10 12 14 16 sts round 5 knit to end of round round 6 *k2tog repeat from * to end of round 5 6 7 8 sts cut tail draw through remaining stitches to fasten_off and weave in ends optional use remaining yarn to make a pompom and fasten to the top © lavanya patricella for personal use only all rightsreserved lavanyapatricella@gmail com http //lavanyapatricella com |http //ravelry com/lavanyapatricella/ | http //instagram com/lavanyapatricella
